# Community Building Strategist: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts Community Building Strategist
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

PetPulse's community strategy transforms customers into advocates through a multi-platform community ecosystem centered on shared pet health concerns and victories. The strategy builds emotional connection through peer support, creates user-generated content flywheel, and drives retention through community engagement.

**Primary Platform:** Facebook Group ("PetPulse Pet Parents")
**Secondary:** Discord, In-app community features
**Year 1 Target:** 10,000 community members, 40% weekly active engagement

---

## Community Strategy Overview

### Community Purpose

**Why Build Community:**
1. **Retention** - Connected customers churn 40% less
2. **Advocacy** - Community members refer 3x more
3. **Support** - Peer support reduces support tickets
4. **Product** - Community feedback drives roadmap
5. **Content** - UGC fuels marketing flywheel

### Community Values

| Value | Description | How We Enforce |
|-------|-------------|----------------|
| **Supportive** | Lift each other up | No judgment, celebrate wins |
| **Authentic** | Real experiences only | No fake testimonials |
| **Educational** | Learn together | Expert content, peer advice |
| **Safe** | Judgment-free zone | Strong moderation |
| **Inclusive** | All pet parents welcome | Diverse representation |

### Community Personas

| Persona | Behavior | Needs | Engagement |
|---------|----------|-------|------------|
| Anxious Newbie | Asks lots of questions | Reassurance, guidance | Daily check-ins |
| Experienced Helper | Answers questions | Recognition, influence | Weekly contributions |
| Lurker | Reads, rarely posts | Information, belonging | Monthly passive |
| Super Fan | Posts constantly | Status, community | Daily advocacy |
| Skeptic | Questions value | Proof, validation | Occasional challenge |

---

### Facebook Group Strategy

**Group Details:**
- Name: "PetPulse Pet Parents - Health & Support Community"
- Privacy: Private (approval required)
- Membership: PetPulse customers + interested leads

**Group Rules:**
1. Be kind, supportive, and respectful
2. No veterinary diagnoses (always consult a vet)
3. Share experiences, not medical advice
4. No spam or self-promotion
5. Respect member privacy
6. Celebrate victories, support struggles
7. Follow PetPulse content guidelines

**Content Categories:**
| Category | Frequency | Description |
|----------|-----------|-------------|
| Welcome Thread | Weekly | New member introductions |
| Vet Q&A | Weekly | Ask-a-vet session |
| Success Stories | 2x/week | Early detection celebrations |
| Health Tips | 3x/week | Educational content |
| Member Spotlight | Weekly | Feature active members |
| Pet Photos | Daily | Casual engagement |
| Feature Feedback | Monthly | Product input |

**Server Structure:**

---

## Community Programs

### Ambassador Program

**Program Overview:**
Top community members become official PetPulse Ambassadors with exclusive benefits and responsibilities.

**Ambassador Tiers:**

| Tier | Requirements | Benefits |
|------|--------------|----------|
| Bronze | 3 referrals, 30-day active | Badge, early access |
| Silver | 10 referrals, 90-day active | Free month, swag box |
| Gold | 25 referrals, ambassador training | Free annual, advisory council |
| Platinum | 50+ referrals, leadership | Revenue share, featured |

**Ambassador Responsibilities:**
- Answer community questions
- Share authentic experiences
- Provide product feedback
- Represent brand values
- Create UGC content

**Ambassador Benefits:**
- Exclusive Discord channel
- Monthly ambassador calls
- Free product/subscription
- Revenue share on referrals
- Early feature access
- Recognition and status

### Vet Expert Program

**Program Goal:** Build credibility through veterinary expert engagement

**Structure:**
- 5-10 partner veterinarians
- Weekly Q&A sessions (rotating)
- Expert content contributions
- Consultation availability
- Crisis response support

**Expert Benefits:**
- Honorarium per session
- Brand exposure
- Community access
- Professional development

### Beta Community

**Purpose:** Engaged users test new features before launch

**Structure:**
- 100-200 active beta testers
- Private Discord channel
- Early access to features
- Feedback requirements
- Bug reporting process

**Selection Criteria:**
- Active community member
- Technical comfort
- Constructive feedback history
- Diverse pet/use case representation

---

## Engagement Framework

### Daily Engagement Rhythm

| Time | Activity | Owner |
|------|----------|-------|
| 8am | Morning post (tip or question) | Community manager |
| 10am | Respond to overnight comments | Community manager |
| 12pm | Midday engagement (react, comment) | Team |
| 3pm | Afternoon content (UGC or story) | Community manager |
| 6pm | Evening engagement peak | Community manager |
| 9pm | Nighttime check, moderate | Community manager |

### Weekly Engagement Calendar

| Day | Theme | Content Type |
|-----|-------|--------------|
| Monday | Motivation Monday | Success story |
| Tuesday | Tip Tuesday | Health education |
| Wednesday | Wellness Wednesday | Preventive care |
| Thursday | Throwback/Story | Member spotlight |
| Friday | Fun Friday | Pet photos, casual |
| Saturday | Community Saturday | Open discussion |
| Sunday | Q&A Sunday | Vet expert session |

### Monthly Programs

| Week | Program | Goal |
|------|---------|------|
| 1 | Member of the Month | Recognition |
| 2 | Product feedback thread | Input |
| 3 | Expert AMA | Education |
| 4 | Community challenge | Engagement |

### Community Challenges

**Challenge Ideas:**
- "30 Days of Walks" - Activity tracking
- "Know Your Pet's Vitals" - Learning challenge
- "Share Your Success Story" - UGC generation
- "Refer a Friend Month" - Referral drive
- "Pet Health Bingo" - Engagement game

**Challenge Structure:**
1. Clear rules and timeline
2. Daily or weekly check-ins
3. Prizes for participation
4. Celebration post at end
5. Winner recognition

---

## Moderation Guidelines

### Moderation Team

| Role | Responsibility | Hours |
|------|----------------|-------|
| Community Manager | Strategy, content, oversight | Full-time |
| Moderator (2-3) | Day-to-day moderation | Part-time |
| Ambassador Mods | Peer moderation support | Volunteer |

### Moderation Protocol

**Post Review:**
- All new member posts reviewed first 7 days
- Flag system for community reporting
- 24-hour response to reported content
- Escalation path for serious issues

**Response to Violations:**

| Severity | Example | Action |
|----------|---------|--------|
| Minor | Off-topic post | Remove, gentle reminder |
| Moderate | Heated argument | Cool-down, warning |
| Serious | Medical misinformation | Remove, private warning |
| Severe | Harassment, spam | Remove, ban |

### Crisis Management

**Health Emergency Protocol:**
1. Flag post immediately
2. Direct to emergency vet resources
3. Do NOT provide medical advice
4. Follow up privately
5. Document incident

**Negative Experience Protocol:**
1. Acknowledge publicly, empathetically
2. Move to private conversation
3. Resolve issue directly
4. Follow up in community if appropriate
5. Learn and improve

---

## User-Generated Content (UGC)

### UGC Strategy

**Types of UGC:**
- Pet photos with PetPulse
- Success/early detection stories
- Dashboard screenshots
- Testimonial videos
- Community discussions

### UGC Collection

**Collection Methods:**
- Hashtag campaigns (#PetPulse, #PetPulsePack)
- Contest submissions
- Story sharing threads
- Direct permission requests
- Ambassador content

**Permission Process:**
1. Identify great content
2. Request permission (DM or comment)
3. Get written consent
4. Credit creator
5. Share across channels

### UGC Repurposing

| UGC Type | Use Case | Platform |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Pet photos | Social media posts | IG, FB, TikTok |
| Success stories | Blog posts, emails | Website, email |
| Testimonials | Ads, website | Paid, organic |
| Screenshots | Product marketing | Website, sales |
| Videos | Social, ads | All platforms |

---

## Community Metrics

### Key Performance Indicators

| Metric | Definition | Target |
|--------|------------|--------|
| Total members | Community size | 10,000 (Y1) |
| Weekly active | Engaged in last 7 days | 40% |
| Monthly active | Engaged in last 30 days | 60% |
| Post volume | User-generated posts/week | 100+ |
| Response time | Time to first response | <4 hours |
| NPS (community) | Community satisfaction | 60+ |
| Referrals from community | Community-driven referrals | 20% of total |

### Engagement Metrics

| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Posts per week | 100+ |
| Comments per week | 500+ |
| Reactions per week | 2,000+ |
| New members per week | 100+ |
| Member retention (30-day) | 80%+ |

### Health Metrics

| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Reported posts | <5/week |
| Banned members | <1% |
| Negative sentiment | <5% |
| Support escalations | <10/week |

---

## Community Growth Strategy

### Growth Tactics

**Organic Growth:**
- Welcome email with community invite
- In-app community prompt
- Post-purchase invitation
- Success story sharing
- Referral program integration

**Paid Promotion:**
- Facebook Group ads (awareness)
- Retargeting to engaged users
- Email campaigns to list

**Partnership Growth:**
- Cross-promotion with pet brands
- Influencer community mentions
- Vet clinic partnerships

### Member Journey

### Onboarding Sequence

**Day 1:**
- Welcome email with group invite
- Admin welcome when they join
- Introduction post prompt

**Day 3:**
- Check if they've introduced
- Highlight interesting content
- Encourage first post

**Day 7:**
- First engagement check
- Highlight relevant discussions
- Ambassador program mention

**Day 30:**
- Engagement review
- Feedback request
- Recognition if active

---

## Tools & Resources

### Community Management Tools

| Function | Tool | Cost |
|----------|------|------|
| Facebook Group | Native | Free |
| Discord | Discord | Free |
| Scheduling | Buffer, Hootsuite | $50-100/mo |
| Moderation | Discord bots, Group tools | Free-$50/mo |
| Analytics | Grytics, native analytics | $50-100/mo |
| CRM | HubSpot, Notion | Varies |

### Content Resources

- Canva templates for community posts
- UGC request templates
- Welcome message scripts
- Moderation response templates
- Crisis communication guides

---

## Launch Plan

### Pre-Launch (4 weeks before)

- [ ] Create Facebook Group
- [ ] Set up Discord server
- [ ] Write community guidelines
- [ ] Create content calendar
- [ ] Design welcome sequence
- [ ] Train moderation team
- [ ] Prepare launch content

### Launch Week

- [ ] Invite first 100 members (beta users)
- [ ] Post daily content
- [ ] Personal welcome to each member
- [ ] First Vet Q&A session
- [ ] Member introduction thread
- [ ] Feedback collection

### Month 1

- [ ] Scale to 500 members
- [ ] Establish engagement rhythm
- [ ] Launch ambassador program
- [ ] First community challenge
- [ ] Collect first UGC batch
- [ ] Refine based on feedback

### Month 3

- [ ] Scale to 2,000 members
- [ ] Ambassador program active
- [ ] Beta community established
- [ ] UGC flowing regularly
- [ ] Community health metrics met
- [ ] Begin Discord promotion

---

## Summary

### Community Strategy

| Element | Approach |
|---------|----------|
| Primary platform | Facebook Group |
| Secondary platform | Discord |
| Target size (Y1) | 10,000 members |
| Engagement target | 40% weekly active |
| Key program | Ambassador program |
| UGC strategy | Systematic collection and repurposing |

### Year 1 Goals

| Goal | Target |
|------|--------|
| Community members | 10,000 |
| Weekly active rate | 40% |
| Referrals from community | 20% of total |
| UGC pieces collected | 500+ |
| Ambassador members | 50+ |
| NPS score | 60+ |

### Key Success Factors

1. **Consistent engagement** - Daily presence, weekly programs
2. **Authentic culture** - Real stories, supportive environment
3. **Expert credibility** - Vet involvement builds trust
4. **Recognition** - Celebrate members, create status
5. **Value exchange** - Members get as much as they give
